getRegisterableDomain()

getRegisterableDomain(string $host) : string

Returns registerable domain portion of provided host

Per the test cases provided by Mozilla (http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/netwerk/test/unit/data/test_psl.txt?raw=1), this method should return null if the domain provided is a public suffix.

Parameters

string $host

host

Returns

string —

registerable domain

Tags

None found
